players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Bob: "Bob is suspicious
I am saying this because the mafioso made a kill last night."

You: "Based on the investigation, Bob is the mafioso
I am saying this because I discovered his role last night."
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. I suggest we focus on Charlie as he is suspicious."
Charlie: "I am not the mafioso. I suggest we investigate Charlie further to see if he has any alibis for last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
